Yiftach Fehige.text: Very pricey. Long line up. Slow service. Great coffee. Cake was okay, nothing of the extraordinary. Free wifi. Some German newspapers are available to read while in shop.

Konstantin Dieterle.text: Been going here regularly before I moved out of Berlin. Good to be back and happy to see it's still buzzing with people! Coffee was delicious and i could also get some work done.

Lyes Yakoubi.text: Wonderful place with free WiFi ! The atmosphere is amazing, you can have a good coffee and relax or get work done ! One of the best coffees in Berlin

Janet Rimmer.text: Visitors in Berlin we were staying round the corner. Once we found this place we went back several times. The coffee was great as were the cake and pastries. The vibe was relaxed and lively at the same time.  What was exceptional was the staff, so friendly and kind to non German speakers. We were made very welcome. We loved it and would return any time we could.

Kuo William.text: Cute little coffee shop that some hipsters go. Ordered an Americano here and the coffee is great
